is-lua_robotspecification.description: To indicate that the robot specification will be declared in a lua file, which enables flexibility for more advanced applications.

file_path.description: Path of the LUA file containing the robot specification. Start with $[colcon_package] to make the path relative to a colcon_package, or start with / to make it an absolute path.

robot_joints.description: Names of the joints in order from the world to the end effector. This names need to be consistent with the ones declared in the URDF file of the robot.
